questions.text: Say you have a cousin from the United States who came here for the first time. He wanted you to show him around the city. If you were to show him around Cebu City, how will you do it?
Jason wants to try a Filipino dish. Yet, as a Chinese, he doesn't know what dish is delectable. As a Filipino friend of Jason, what Filipino dish would you recommend and why?

You have internet service and currently subscribed a fast internet connection. The connection eventually became sluggish and you contact customer support. Knowing that you've never missed any payments and always paid on time, how will you deal this situation with a representative from your internet service provider?

Imagine this: You're at the market with just 50 pesos left in your pocket. You still need to buy 6 eggs, but they cost 10 pesos each, thatâ€™s 60 pesos total. You're short by 10 pesos. How would you talk to the vendor and try to get all 6 eggs with the money you have?
Suppose your best friend is feeling really down because they just lost their brand new phone. How would you respond to comfort them and help them feel a little better?

A couple of tourists were asking for directions to a certain place in Cebu City. They asked if you could come with them and show them the way. However, you needed to be somewhere else and you cannot join them. How will you respond to the tourists and still point them to the right direction?
If you were only allowed to take five things to an unknown destination, what would you take?
In what way do you think do colours affect your mood?
What is your country famous for?
Tell us a time when you received a gift you did not like.
